resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104405</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104405</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202785</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Scientific Inquiry (Archaeology)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaftliche Anfrage (Archäologie)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enquête Scientifique (Archéologie)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inquérito Científico (Archaeology)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inchiesta Scientifica (Archaeology)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστημονική έρευνα (αρχαιολογία)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pregunta Científica (Archaeology)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson introduces students to scientific inquiry through the use of an activity sheet. This unit is based on Lesson 1.7 in "Intrigue of the Past: North Carolina's First Peoples", which is part of a national curriculum-development program called "Project Archaeology":</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion stellt Kursteilnehmer zur 
wissenschaftlichen Anfrage durch den Gebrauch eines Aktivität Blattes
vor. Diese Maßeinheit basiert auf Lektion 1.7 "in der Intrige 
der Vergangenheit: Nord-Carolina ersten bevölkert ", das ein 
Teil eines nationalen Lehrplan-Entwicklung Programms ist, das" 
Projekt-Archäologie "genannt wird:</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon présente des étudiants à l'enquête
scientifique par l'utilisation d'une feuille d'activité. Cette 
unité est basée sur la leçon 1.7 dans l'"intrigue du passé : 
La Caroline du nord première peuple ", qui fait partie d'un
programme national de programme d'études-développement appelé" 
l'archéologie de projet ":</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição introduz estudantes ao inquérito 
científico com o uso de uma folha da atividade. Esta unidade é
baseada na lição 1.7 no "intrigue do passado: North.carolina 
primeiro povoa ", que é parte de um programa nacional do 
curriculum-desenvolvimento chamado" archaeology do projeto ":</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione introduce gli allievi all'inchiesta 
scientifica con l'uso di un foglio di attività. Questa unità 
è basata sulla lezione 1.7 "nell'intrigo dell'esperienza: 
North.carolina primo popola ", che fa parte di un programma 
nazionale di programma di studi-sviluppo chiamato" archaeology di 
progetto ":</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εισάγει τους σπουδαστές στην 
επιστημονική έρευνα μέσω της χρήσης ενός φύλλου δραστηριότητας.
Αυτή η μονάδα είναι βασισμένη στο μάθημα 1,7 "στη 
δολοπλοκία του παρελθόντος: Πρώτοι λαοί της βόρειας 
Καρολίνας ", το οποίο είναι μέρος ενός εθνικού προγράμματος 
πρόγραμμα σπουδών-ανάπτυξης αποκαλούμενου" αρχαιολογία έργου ":</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección introduce a estudiantes a la pregunta
científica con el uso de una hoja de la actividad. Esta unidad 
se basa en la lección 1.7 en el "encanto del pasado: Carolina 
del Norte primera puebla ", que es parte de un programa nacional del 
plan de estudios-desarrollo llamado" archaeology del proyecto ":</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:UNC ARCHAEOLOGY
FN:UNC ARCHAEOLOGY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202785</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104405</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/scientific-inquiry-archaeology</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
